arabicText: مَن يُضْلِلِ ٱللَّهُ فَلَا هَادِىَ لَهُۥ ۚ وَيَذَرُهُمْ فِى طُغْيَـٰنِهِمْ يَعْمَهُونَ
englishTranslationText:
For	one	whom	Allah sends	astray,	there	is	none	to	guide	him;	and	He	leaves	them	to	wander	in	
their	rebellion.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Jise	Allah	gumrah	kare	usey	koi	rāh	dikhāne	wāla	nahi	aur	unheiñ		chhodta	hai	ke	apni	sarkashi	
meiñ	bhatka	kareiñ	.

arabicText: يَسْـَٔلُونَكَ عَنِ ٱلسَّاعَةِ أَيَّانَ مُرْسَىٰهَا ۖ قُلْ إِنَّمَا عِلْمُهَا عِندَ رَبِّى ۖ لَا يُجَلِّيهَا لِوَقْتِهَآ إِلَّا هُوَ ۚ ثَقُلَتْ فِى ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ ۚ لَا تَأْتِيكُمْ إِلَّا بَغْتَةًۭ ۗ يَسْـَٔلُونَكَ كَأَنَّكَ حَفِىٌّ عَنْهَا ۖ قُلْ إِنَّمَا عِلْمُهَا عِندَ ٱللَّهِ وَلَـٰكِنَّ أَكْثَرَ ٱلنَّاسِ لَا يَعْلَمُونَ
englishTranslationText:
They	ask	you	about	the	Resurrection,	as	to	when	it	is	destined;	say,	“Indeed	its	knowledge	is	with	
my	Lord;	only	He	will	manifest	it	at	its	time;	it	is	proving	cumbersome	in	the	heavens	and	the	
earth;	it	will	not	come	to	you	except	suddenly”;	they	question	you	as	if	you	have	researched	it	
deeply;	say,	“Indeed	its	knowledge	is	with	Allah only	but	most	people	do	not	know.”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Tum	se	Qiyamat	ko	poochhte	haiñ	ke	woh	kab	ko	thehri	hai	(Kab	āayegi)	tum	farmāo	uska	ilm	to	
mere	Rab	 ke	pās	hai	usey	wohi	uske	waqt	par	zāhir	 karega	bhāri	pad	 rahi	hai	āasmānon	aur	
zameen	meiñ	tum	par	na	āayegi	magar	achānak	tum	se	aisa	poochte	haiñ	goya	tum	ne	usey	khoob	
tehqeeq	kar	rakha	hai	tum	farmāo	uska	ilm	to	Allah	hi	ke	pās	hai	lekin	bahut	log	jānte	nahi

arabicText: قُل لَّآ أَمْلِكُ لِنَفْسِى نَفْعًۭا وَلَا ضَرًّا إِلَّا مَا شَآءَ ٱللَّهُ ۚ وَلَوْ كُنتُ أَعْلَمُ ٱلْغَيْبَ لَٱسْتَكْثَرْتُ مِنَ ٱلْخَيْرِ وَمَا مَسَّنِىَ ٱلسُّوٓءُ ۚ إِنْ أَنَا۠ إِلَّا نَذِيرٌۭ وَبَشِيرٌۭ لِّقَوْمٍۢ يُؤْمِنُونَ
englishTranslationText:
Say,	“I	have	no	autonomy	to	benefit	or	hurt	
myself,	except	what	Allah wills;	and	were	I	
to	procure	knowledge	of	the	hidden	on	my	
own,	it	would	be	that	I	had	accumulated	a	
lot	of	good;	and	no	misfortune	would	touch	
me;	 I	am	purely	a	Herald	of	Warning	and	
Glad	Tidings	to	the	people	who	believe.”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Tum	farmāo		maiñ	apni	jān	ke	bhale	bure	
ka	 khud	 mukhtār	 nahi	 magar	 jo	 Allah	
chāhe	aur	agar	maiñ	ghaib	jān	liya	karta	to	
yooñ	hota	ke	maiñ	ne	bahut	bhalāyi	jama’	
karli	 aur	 mujhe	 koi	 burāyi	 na	 pahuñchi	
maiñ	 to	 yehi	dar	aur	khushi	sunāne	wāla	
hooñ	unheiñ		jo	Imān	rakhte	haiñ

arabicText: ۞ هُوَ ٱلَّذِى خَلَقَكُم مِّن نَّفْسٍۢ وَٰحِدَةٍۢ وَجَعَلَ مِنْهَا زَوْجَهَا لِيَسْكُنَ إِلَيْهَا ۖ فَلَمَّا تَغَشَّىٰهَا حَمَلَتْ حَمْلًا خَفِيفًۭا فَمَرَّتْ بِهِۦ ۖ فَلَمَّآ أَثْقَلَت دَّعَوَا ٱللَّهَ رَبَّهُمَا لَئِنْ ءَاتَيْتَنَا صَـٰلِحًۭا لَّنَكُونَنَّ مِنَ ٱلشَّـٰكِرِينَ
englishTranslationText:
It	is	He	Who	created	you	from	a	single	soul,	
and	from	him	made	its	mate	for	him	to	gain	
comfort	 with	 her;	 so	 when	 the	 male	
covered	 her,	 she	 was	 burdened	lightly	in	
her	womb,	and	she	therefore	moved	easily	
carrying	it;	and	when	she	 felt	 the	burden	
heavy,	they	both	cried	to	their	Lord	Allah,	
“Indeed	You	may	give	to	us	a	child	as	You	
will,	so	we	will	surely	be	thankful.”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Wohi	hai	jisne	tumheiñ	ek	jān	se	paida	kiya	
aur	usi	meiñ	se	uska	joda	banāya	ke	us	se	
chain	(āarām)	pāaye	phir	jab	mard	us	par	
chhaya	 usey	 ek	 halka	 sa	 pet	 reh	 gaya	 to	
usey	liye	phira	ki	(Chalti	phirti	rahi)	phir	
jab	bojhal	padi	donoñ	ne	apne	Rab	Allah	se	
du’a		ki	zaroor	agar	tu	hameiñ	jaisa	chāhiye	
bachcha	dega	to	be-shak	hum	shukr	guzār	
hoñge.

arabicText: فَلَمَّآ ءَاتَىٰهُمَا صَـٰلِحًۭا جَعَلَا لَهُۥ شُرَكَآءَ فِيمَآ ءَاتَىٰهُمَا ۚ فَتَعَـٰلَى ٱللَّهُ عَمَّا يُشْرِكُونَ
englishTranslationText:
So	when	He	bestowed	them	a	normal	child,	
they	ascribed	partners	(to	Him)	in	respect	
of	 what	 He	 had	 bestowed	 upon	 them;	
therefore	Supreme	is	Allah,	above	all	that	
they	ascribe	as	partners.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Phir	jab	us	ne	unheñ	jaisa	chāhiye	bachcha	
‘aṭa	farmaya	unhoñ	ne	uski	‘aṭa	meiñ	uske	
sājhi	Shareek	thehrāye	to	Allah	ko	bartari	
hai	unke	shirk	se

arabicText: أَيُشْرِكُونَ مَا لَا يَخْلُقُ شَيْـًۭٔا وَهُمْ يُخْلَقُونَ
englishTranslationText:
Do	 they	 (the	 disbelievers)	 ascribe	 (false	
deities)	that	which	do	not	create	anything,	
but	are	themselves	created?
romanUrduTranslationText:
Kya	 usey	 shareek	 karte	 haiñ	jo	 kuchh	 na	
banaye	aur	woh	khud	banaye	huwe	haiñ

arabicText: وَلَا يَسْتَطِيعُونَ لَهُمْ نَصْرًۭا وَلَآ أَنفُسَهُمْ يَنصُرُونَ
englishTranslationText:
And	cannot	provide	any	help	to	them,	nor	
do	they	help	themselves?
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	 na	 woh	 unko	 koi	 madad	 pahuñcha	
sakeñ	aur	na	apni	jānoñ		ki	madad	kareiñ

arabicText: وَإِن تَدْعُوهُمْ إِلَى ٱلْهُدَىٰ لَا يَتَّبِعُوكُمْ ۚ سَوَآءٌ عَلَيْكُمْ أَدَعَوْتُمُوهُمْ أَمْ أَنتُمْ صَـٰمِتُونَ
englishTranslationText:
And	if	you	call	the	disbelievers	to	guidance,	
they	do	not	follow	you;	it	is	the	same	for	you,	whether	you	invite	them	or	remain	silent.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	agar	tum	unheiñ	rāh	ki	taraf	bulāo	to	tumhāre	peechhe	na	āayeiñ tum	par	ek	sa	hai	chāhe	
unheiñ		pukāro	ya	chup	raho

arabicText: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ تَدْعُونَ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ عِبَادٌ أَمْثَالُكُمْ ۖ فَٱدْعُوهُمْ فَلْيَسْتَجِيبُوا۟ لَكُمْ إِن كُنتُمْ صَـٰدِقِينَ
englishTranslationText:
Indeed	those	whom	you	(the	disbelievers)	worship	besides	Allah are	slaves	like	you	- so	call	them	
and	they	may	answer	you,	if	you	are	truthful!
romanUrduTranslationText:
Be-shak	woh	jin	ko	tum	Allah	ke	siwa	poojte	ho	tumhāri	tarah	bande	haiñ	to	unheiñ	pukāro	phir	
woh	tumheiñ	jawāb	dein	agar	tum	sachche	ho

arabicText: أَلَهُمْ أَرْجُلٌۭ يَمْشُونَ بِهَآ ۖ أَمْ لَهُمْ أَيْدٍۢ يَبْطِشُونَ بِهَآ ۖ أَمْ لَهُمْ أَعْيُنٌۭ يُبْصِرُونَ بِهَآ ۖ أَمْ لَهُمْ ءَاذَانٌۭ يَسْمَعُونَ بِهَا ۗ قُلِ ٱدْعُوا۟ شُرَكَآءَكُمْ ثُمَّ كِيدُونِ فَلَا تُنظِرُونِ
englishTranslationText:
Do	they	have	feet	to	walk	with?	Or	have	they	hands	to	hold	with?	Or	have	they	eyes	to	see	with?	
Or	have	they	ears	to	hear	with?	Say,	“Call	upon	your	ascribed	partners	and	conspire	against	me,	
and	do	not	give	me	respite.”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Kya	unke	pāoñ	haiñ	jin	se	chaleñ	ya	unke	hāth	haiñ	jin	se	giraft	kareiñ		ya	unke	āañkheiñ		haiñ	jin	
se	dekheiñ	ya	unke	kān	haiñ	jin	se	suneiñ	tum	farmāo	ke	apne	shareekoñ	ko	pukāro	aur	mujh	par	
dāoñ	chalo	aur	mujhe	mohlat	na	do

arabicText: إِنَّ وَلِـِّۧىَ ٱللَّهُ ٱلَّذِى نَزَّلَ ٱلْكِتَـٰبَ ۖ وَهُوَ يَتَوَلَّى ٱلصَّـٰلِحِينَ
englishTranslationText:
“Indeed	 my	 Protector	 is	 Allah Who	 has	
sent	down	the	Book;	and	He	befriends	the	
righteous.”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Be-shak	 mera	 wāli	 Allah	 hai	 jis	 ne	 kitāb	
utāri	aur	woh	nekoñ	ko	dost	rakhta	hai

arabicText: وَٱلَّذِينَ تَدْعُونَ مِن دُونِهِۦ لَا يَسْتَطِيعُونَ نَصْرَكُمْ وَلَآ أَنفُسَهُمْ يَنصُرُونَ
englishTranslationText:
“And	 those	 whom	 you	 worship	 besides	
Him	 cannot	 help	 you	 nor	 do	 they	 help	
themselves.”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	 jinheiñ	 uske	 siwa	 poojte	 ho	 woh	
tumhāri	madad	nahi	kar	sakte	aur	na	khud	
apni	madad	kareiñ

arabicText: وَإِن تَدْعُوهُمْ إِلَى ٱلْهُدَىٰ لَا يَسْمَعُوا۟ ۖ وَتَرَىٰهُمْ يَنظُرُونَ إِلَيْكَ وَهُمْ لَا يُبْصِرُونَ
englishTranslationText:
And	if	 you	 call	 them	 to	 guidance	 they	 do	
not	listen;	and	you	(Prophet	Muhammad -
peace	and	blessings	be	upon	him)	observe	
them	 looking	 towards	 you,	 whereas	 they	
do	not	perceive	anything.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	agar	tum	unheiñ		rāh	ki	taraf	bulāo	to	
na	suneiñ	aur	tu	unheñ	dekhe	ke	woh	teri	
taraf	dekh	rahe	haiñ	aur	unheiñ		kuchh	bhi	
nahi	soojhta.

arabicText: خُذِ ٱلْعَفْوَ وَأْمُرْ بِٱلْعُرْفِ وَأَعْرِضْ عَنِ ٱلْجَـٰهِلِينَ
englishTranslationText:
And	 O	 dear	 Prophet	(Muhammad - peace	
and	 blessings	 be	 upon	 him)	 adopt	
forgiveness,	 and	 enjoin	 virtue,	 and	 turn	
away	from	the	ignorant.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aey	 Mehboob' Mu'āf	 karna	 ikhtiyār	 karo	
aur	 bhalāyi	 ka	 ḥukm	 	 do	 aur	 jāhiloñ	 se	
moñh	pher	lo

arabicText: وَإِمَّا يَنزَغَنَّكَ مِنَ ٱلشَّيْطَـٰنِ نَزْغٌۭ فَٱسْتَعِذْ بِٱللَّهِ ۚ إِنَّهُۥ سَمِيعٌ عَلِيمٌ
englishTranslationText:
And	O	listener!	 If	 the	devil	provokes	you,	
seek	 the	 refuge	 of	Allah;	indeed	He	is	All	
Hearing,	All	Knowing.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	aey	sunne	wāle' agar	shaitān	tujhe	koi	
koñcha	 de	 (Kisi	 bure	 kām	 par	 uksāye)	 to	
Allah	 ki	 panah	māñg	 be-shak	 wohi	 sunta	
jānta	hai

arabicText: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ ٱتَّقَوْا۟ إِذَا مَسَّهُمْ طَـٰٓئِفٌۭ مِّنَ ٱلشَّيْطَـٰنِ تَذَكَّرُوا۟ فَإِذَا هُم مُّبْصِرُونَ
englishTranslationText:
Indeed	 those	 who	 fear	 get	 alerted	
whenever	 a	 temptation	 from	 the	 devil	
troubles	 them,	 and	 they	 perceive	
immediately.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Be-shak	woh	jo	dar	wāle	haiñ	jab	unheiñ		
kisi	 shaitāni	 khayāl	 ki	 thes	 lagti	 hai	
hoshiyār	 ho	 jāte	 haiñ	 usi	 waqt	 unki	
āañkheiñ		khul	jāti	haiñ

arabicText: وَإِخْوَٰنُهُمْ يَمُدُّونَهُمْ فِى ٱلْغَىِّ ثُمَّ لَا يُقْصِرُونَ
englishTranslationText:
And	 the	 devils	 pull	 those	 who	 their	
brothers	into	error,	and	then	do	not	make	
any	relaxation.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	woh	jo	shaitānoñ	ke	bhai	haiñ	shaitān	
unheiñ		gumrāhi	meiñ	kheeñchte	haiñ	phir	
gayi (Kotāhi)	nahi	karte.

arabicText: وَإِذَا لَمْ تَأْتِهِم بِـَٔايَةٍۢ قَالُوا۟ لَوْلَا ٱجْتَبَيْتَهَا ۚ قُلْ إِنَّمَآ أَتَّبِعُ مَا يُوحَىٰٓ إِلَىَّ مِن رَّبِّى ۚ هَـٰذَا بَصَآئِرُ مِن رَّبِّكُمْ وَهُدًۭى وَرَحْمَةٌۭ لِّقَوْمٍۢ يُؤْمِنُونَ
englishTranslationText:
And	 O	 dear	 Prophet	(Muhammad - peace	
and	blessings	be	upon	him)	when	you	do	not	bring	to	them	a	verse,	they	say,	“Why	did	you	not	
fabricate	it?”	Say,	“I	 follow	only	what	is	divinely	revealed	to	me	 from	my	Lord”;	this	(the	Holy	
Qur’an)	is	an	enlightenment	from	your	Lord,	and	a	guidance	and	a mercy	for	the	Muslims.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	 aey	 Mehboob' Jab	 tum	 unke	 pās	 koi	
āayat	 na	 lāo	 to	 kehte	 haiñ	 tum	 ne	 dil	 se	
kyuñ		na	banayi	Tum	farmāo		maiñ	to	usi	ki	
pairwi	karta	hooñ	jo	meri	taraf	mere	Rab	se	Waḥi	hoti	hai	yeh	tumhāre	Rab	ki	taraf	se	āañkheiñ			
kholna	hai	aur	hidāyat	aur	raḥmat	musalmanoñ	ke	liye	.

arabicText: وَإِذَا قُرِئَ ٱلْقُرْءَانُ فَٱسْتَمِعُوا۟ لَهُۥ وَأَنصِتُوا۟ لَعَلَّكُمْ تُرْحَمُونَ
englishTranslationText: And	when	the	Qur’an	is	recited,	listen	to	it	attentively	and	keep	silent,	so	that	you	receive	mercy.
romanUrduTranslationText: Aur	jab	Qur’ān	padha	jāye	to	usey	kān	laga	kar	suno	aur	khamosh	raho	ke	tum	par	rahem	ho

arabicText: وَٱذْكُر رَّبَّكَ فِى نَفْسِكَ تَضَرُّعًۭا وَخِيفَةًۭ وَدُونَ ٱلْجَهْرِ مِنَ ٱلْقَوْلِ بِٱلْغُدُوِّ وَٱلْـَٔاصَالِ وَلَا تَكُن مِّنَ ٱلْغَـٰفِلِينَ
englishTranslationText:
And	remember	your	Lord	within	your	hearts	humbly	and	with	fear,	and	softly	with	your	tongues,	
morning	and	evening,	and	do	not	be	of	the	neglectful.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	apne	Rab	ko	apne	dil	meiñ	yād	karo	zāri	(āajizi)	aur	dar	se	aur	be	āawāz	nikle	zubān	se	subah	
aur	shām	aur	ghāfiloñ	meiñ	na	hoña	.

arabicText: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ عِندَ رَبِّكَ لَا يَسْتَكْبِرُونَ عَنْ عِبَادَتِهِۦ وَيُسَبِّحُونَهُۥ وَلَهُۥ يَسْجُدُونَ ۩
englishTranslationText:
Indeed	 those	who	 are	with	 your	 Lord	 are	 not	 conceited	 towards	worshipping	Him,	 and	 they	
proclaim	His	Purity and	it	is	to	Him	they	prostrate.	
(Command of Prostration # 1)
romanUrduTranslationText:
Be-shak	woh	jo	tere	Rab	ke	pās	haiñ	uski	ibādat	se	takabbur	nahi	karte	aur	uski	pāki	bolte	aur	
usi	ko	sajda	karte	haiñ.	
(Sajde ka hukm # 1

arabicText: يَسْـَٔلُونَكَ عَنِ ٱلْأَنفَالِ ۖ قُلِ ٱلْأَنفَالُ لِلَّهِ وَٱلرَّسُولِ ۖ فَٱتَّقُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ وَأَصْلِحُوا۟ ذَاتَ بَيْنِكُمْ ۖ وَأَطِيعُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ وَرَسُولَهُۥٓ إِن كُنتُم مُّؤْمِنِينَ
englishTranslationText:
They	ask	you	O	dear	Prophet	(Muhammad
- peace	 and	 blessings	 be	 upon	 him)	
concerning	the	war	booty;	say,	“Allah and	
the	Noble	Messenger	are	the	owners	of	the	
war	 booty;	 so	 fear	 Allah and	 maintain	
friendship	 among	 yourselves;	 and	 obey	
Allah and	 His	 Noble	 Messenger,	 if	 you	
have	faith."
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aey	 Mehboob' Tum	 se	 ghanimatoñ	 ko	
poochhte	haiñ	tum	farmāo		ghanimatoñ	ke	
mālik	Allah-o-Rasool	haiñ	to	Allah	se	daro	
aur	 apne	 āapas	 meiñ	 mel	 (Sulah	 Safāyi)	
rakho	aur	Allah	o	Rasool	ka	ḥukm		māno	
agar	Imān	rakhte	ho.

arabicText: إِنَّمَا ٱلْمُؤْمِنُونَ ٱلَّذِينَ إِذَا ذُكِرَ ٱللَّهُ وَجِلَتْ قُلُوبُهُمْ وَإِذَا تُلِيَتْ عَلَيْهِمْ ءَايَـٰتُهُۥ زَادَتْهُمْ إِيمَـٰنًۭا وَعَلَىٰ رَبِّهِمْ يَتَوَكَّلُونَ
englishTranslationText:
Only	 they	are	 the	 believers	whose	 hearts	
fear	when	Allah is	remembered,	and	their	
faith	advances	when	His	verses	are	recited	
to	them,	and	who	trust	only	in	their	Lord.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Imān	wāle	wohi	haiñ	ke	jab	Allah	yād	kiya	
jāye	unke	dil	dar	jāyeñ	aur	jab	un	par	uski	
āayateiñ	 padhi	jāyeiñ	 unka	 Imān	 taraqqi	
pāaye	aur	apne	Rab	hi	par	bharosa	kareiñ

arabicText: ٱلَّذِينَ يُقِيمُونَ ٱلصَّلَوٰةَ وَمِمَّا رَزَقْنَـٰهُمْ يُنفِقُونَ
englishTranslationText:
Those	 who	 keep	 the	 prayer	 established	
and	spend	in	Our	cause	from	what	We	have	
bestowed	upon	them.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Woh	jo	Namāz	qāim	rakhein	aur	hamāre	
diye	 se	 kuchh	 hamāri	 rāh	 meiñ	 kharch	
kareiñ

arabicText: أُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلْمُؤْمِنُونَ حَقًّۭا ۚ لَّهُمْ دَرَجَـٰتٌ عِندَ رَبِّهِمْ وَمَغْفِرَةٌۭ وَرِزْقٌۭ كَرِيمٌۭ
englishTranslationText:
These	are	 the	 true	Muslims;	 for	 them	are	
ranks	 before	 their	 Lord,	 and	 forgiveness	
and	an	honourable	sustenance.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Yehi	 sachche	 Musalman	 haiñ	 inke	 liye	
darje	haiñ	inke	Rab	ke	pās	aur	bakhshish	
hai	aur	‘izzat	ki	rozi

arabicText: كَمَآ أَخْرَجَكَ رَبُّكَ مِنۢ بَيْتِكَ بِٱلْحَقِّ وَإِنَّ فَرِيقًۭا مِّنَ ٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ لَكَـٰرِهُونَ
englishTranslationText:
The	 way	 your	 Lord	 caused	 you,	 O	 dear	
Prophet	 to	 come	 forth	 from	 your	 home	
with	 the	 truth;	 and	 indeed	 a	 group	 of	
Muslims	were	unhappy	about	it.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Jis	tarah	aey	Mehboob' Tumheiñ	tumhāre	
Rab	ne	 tumhāre	ghar	se	Haq	ke	sāth	bar	
āmad	kiya	aur	be-shak	musalmanoñ	ka	ek	
giroh	is	par	na-khush	tha

arabicText: يُجَـٰدِلُونَكَ فِى ٱلْحَقِّ بَعْدَ مَا تَبَيَّنَ كَأَنَّمَا يُسَاقُونَ إِلَى ٱلْمَوْتِ وَهُمْ يَنظُرُونَ
englishTranslationText:
Disputing	with	you	regarding	the	truth	after	it	had	been	made	clear,	as	if	they	were	being	herded	
towards	a	visible	death.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Sachchi	bāt	meiñ	tum	se	jhagadte	they	b’ad	iske	ke	zāhir	ho	chuki	goya	woh	āañkhoñ	dekhi	maut	
ki	taraf	hāñke	jāte	haiñ

arabicText: وَإِذْ يَعِدُكُمُ ٱللَّهُ إِحْدَى ٱلطَّآئِفَتَيْنِ أَنَّهَا لَكُمْ وَتَوَدُّونَ أَنَّ غَيْرَ ذَاتِ ٱلشَّوْكَةِ تَكُونُ لَكُمْ وَيُرِيدُ ٱللَّهُ أَن يُحِقَّ ٱلْحَقَّ بِكَلِمَـٰتِهِۦ وَيَقْطَعَ دَابِرَ ٱلْكَـٰفِرِينَ
englishTranslationText:
And	remember	when	Allah promised	you	that	one	of	the	two	groups	(of	enemies)	is	for	you,	and	
you	wished	 to	get	 the	one	 that	posed	no	danger,	and	Allah willed	 to	prove	 the	 truth	with	His	
Words,	and	to	cut	the	origins	of	the	disbelievers.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	yād	karo	jab	Allah	ne	tumheiñ	w’ada	diya	tha	ke	in	dono	girohoñ	meiñ	ek	tumhāre	liye	hai	
aur	tum	yeh	chāhte	they	ke	tumheiñ	woh	mile	jis	meiñ	kāñte	ka	khatka	(Kisi	Nuqsān	ka	dar)	nahi	
aur	Allah	yeh	chāhta	tha	ke	apne	kalām	se	sach	ko	sach	kar	dikhaye	aur	kāfiroñ		ki	jad	kāt	de	
(Halāk	kar	de)	.

arabicText: لِيُحِقَّ ٱلْحَقَّ وَيُبْطِلَ ٱلْبَـٰطِلَ وَلَوْ كَرِهَ ٱلْمُجْرِمُونَ
englishTranslationText: In	order	that	He	may	prove	the	truth	and	disprove	falsehood,	even	if	the	criminals	get	annoyed.
romanUrduTranslationText: Ke	sach	ko	sach	kare	aur	jhoot	ko	jhoota	pade	bura	māneiñ	mujrim

arabicText: إِذْ تَسْتَغِيثُونَ رَبَّكُمْ فَٱسْتَجَابَ لَكُمْ أَنِّى مُمِدُّكُم بِأَلْفٍۢ مِّنَ ٱلْمَلَـٰٓئِكَةِ مُرْدِفِينَ
englishTranslationText:
When	 you	 (Prophet	 Muhammad - peace	
and	 blessings	 be	 upon	 him)	 were	 seeking	
the	help	of	your	Lord,	so	He	answered	your	
prayers	that,	“I	will	help	you	with	a	row	of	
thousands	of	angels.”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Jab	tum	apne	Rab	se	fariyād	karte	they	to	
us	 ne	 tumhāri	 sun	 li	 ke	 maiñ	 tumheiñ	
madad	dene	wāla	hooñ	hazār	Firishtoñ		ki	
qatār	se

arabicText: وَمَا جَعَلَهُ ٱللَّهُ إِلَّا بُشْرَىٰ وَلِتَطْمَئِنَّ بِهِۦ قُلُوبُكُمْ ۚ وَمَا ٱلنَّصْرُ إِلَّا مِنْ عِندِ ٱللَّهِ ۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ عَزِيزٌ حَكِيمٌ
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur yeh	to	Allah	ne	na	kiya	magar	tumhāri	
khushi	ko	aur	is	liye	ke	tumhāre	dil	chain	
pāayeñ	 	 aur	 madad	 nahi	 magar	 Allah	 ki	
taraf	se	be-shak	Allah	ghalib	hikmat	wāla	
hai.

arabicText: إِذْ يُغَشِّيكُمُ ٱلنُّعَاسَ أَمَنَةًۭ مِّنْهُ وَيُنَزِّلُ عَلَيْكُم مِّنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ مَآءًۭ لِّيُطَهِّرَكُم بِهِۦ وَيُذْهِبَ عَنكُمْ رِجْزَ ٱلشَّيْطَـٰنِ وَلِيَرْبِطَ عَلَىٰ قُلُوبِكُمْ وَيُثَبِّتَ بِهِ ٱلْأَقْدَامَ
englishTranslationText:
When	He	made	the	slumber	overcome	you,	
so	it	was	as	a	peacefulness	from	Him,	and	
sent	down	water	from	the	sky	upon	you	to	
purify	 you	 with	 it,	 and	 to	 remove	 the	
impurity	 of	 Satan	 from	 you,	 and	 to	 give	
your	hearts	 fortitude	and	 firmly	establish	
your	feet	with	it.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Jab	 us	 ne	 tumheiñ	 ooñgh	 se	 gher	 diya	 to	
uski	 taraf	 se	 chain	 (Taskeen)	 thi	 aur	
āasmān	se	tum	par	pāni	utāra	ke	tumheiñ	
us	se	suthra	karde	aur	shaitān	ki	na-pāki	
tum	se	door	farmade	aur	tumhāre	diloñ		ki	
dhāras	 bañdhaye	 aur	 us	 se	 tumhāre	
qadam	jamā	de

arabicText: إِذْ يُوحِى رَبُّكَ إِلَى ٱلْمَلَـٰٓئِكَةِ أَنِّى مَعَكُمْ فَثَبِّتُوا۟ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ ۚ سَأُلْقِى فِى قُلُوبِ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ ٱلرُّعْبَ فَٱضْرِبُوا۟ فَوْقَ ٱلْأَعْنَاقِ وَٱضْرِبُوا۟ مِنْهُمْ كُلَّ بَنَانٍۢ
englishTranslationText:
And	when	O	dear	Prophet,	your	Lord	was	
inspiring	the	angels	that,	“I	am	with	you	-
so	 make	 the	 believers	 stand	 firm;	 I	 will	
soon	 instil	 fear	 into	 the	 hearts	 of	 the	
disbelievers,	 so	 strike	 above	 the	
disbelievers’	necks	and	hit	their	each	and	
every	bone	joint.”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Jab	 aey	Mehboob' Tumhāra	 Rab	 firishtoñ		
ko	Waḥi	bhejta	tha	ke	maiñ	tumhāre	sāth	
hooñ	tum	musalmanoñ	ko	sābit	rakho	‘anqareeb	maiñ	kāfiroñ		ke	diloñ		meiñ	haibat	
dāloñga	 to	 kāfiroñ	 	 ki	 gardanoñ	 se	 ūpar	
māro	 aur	 unki	 ek	 ek	 por	 (Jod)	 par	 zarb	
lagāo

arabicText: ذَٰلِكَ بِأَنَّهُمْ شَآقُّوا۟ ٱللَّهَ وَرَسُولَهُۥ ۚ وَمَن يُشَاقِقِ ٱللَّهَ وَرَسُولَهُۥ فَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ شَدِيدُ ٱلْعِقَابِ
englishTranslationText:
This	is	because	they	opposed	Allah and	His	
Noble	 Messenger;	 and	 whoever	 opposes	
Allah and	His	Noble	Messenger	- then	indeed	Allah’s	punishment	is	severe.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Yeh	is	liye	ke	unhoñ	ne	Allah	aur	uske	Rasool	se	mukhālifat	ki	aur	jo	Allah	aur	uske	Rasool	se	
mukhālifat	kare	to	be-shak	Allah	ka	‘aƶāb		sakht	hai	.

arabicText: ذَٰلِكُمْ فَذُوقُوهُ وَأَنَّ لِلْكَـٰفِرِينَ عَذَابَ ٱلنَّارِ
englishTranslationText: Therefore	taste	this	for	now,	and	along	with	it	for	the	disbelievers	is	the	punishment	of	fire.
romanUrduTranslationText: Yeh	to	chakho	aur	iske	sāth	yeh	hai	ke	kāfiroñ		ko	āag		ka	‘aƶāb		hai

arabicText: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوٓا۟ إِذَا لَقِيتُمُ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ زَحْفًۭا فَلَا تُوَلُّوهُمُ ٱلْأَدْبَارَ
englishTranslationText:
O	People	who	Believe!	When	you	confront	a	large	army	of	disbelievers	in	battle,	do	not	turn	your	
backs	to	them.
romanUrduTranslationText: Aey	Imān	wālo' jab	kāfiroñ		ke	lām	(Lashkar)	se	tumhāra	muqābla	ho	to	unheiñ		peeth	na	do

arabicText: وَمَن يُوَلِّهِمْ يَوْمَئِذٍۢ دُبُرَهُۥٓ إِلَّا مُتَحَرِّفًۭا لِّقِتَالٍ أَوْ مُتَحَيِّزًا إِلَىٰ فِئَةٍۢ فَقَدْ بَآءَ بِغَضَبٍۢ مِّنَ ٱللَّهِ وَمَأْوَىٰهُ جَهَنَّمُ ۖ وَبِئْسَ ٱلْمَصِيرُ
englishTranslationText:
And	on	that	day	whoever	turns	his	back	to	them,	except	for	a	battle	strategy	or	to	join	one’s	own	
company,	has	 then	 turned	 towards	Allah’s	wrath,	and	his	destination	is	hell;	and	what	an	evil	
place	of	return!
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	jo	us	din	unheiñ		peeth	dega	magar	ladāi	ka	hunar	karne	ya	apni	jamāt	meiñ	ja	milne	ko	to	
woh	Allah	ke	ghaƶab	meiñ	palta	aur	uska	thikana	dozakh	hai	aur	kya	buri	jagah	hai	palatne	ki
